content.text:
# Draft:Dilip Kumar Tiwari

----
Dr. Dilip Kumar Tiwari
Born: 3 April 1981, Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh
Profession: Social worker, Industrialist
Introduction
Dr. Dilip Kumar Tiwari is an dedicated social worker and industrialist from Jaunpur district in Uttar Pradesh.
He is the founder of Mission Zindagi Foundation, director of Sudev India Pvt Ltd it is engaged in waste management, manufacturing and hospital surgical, an organisation actively engaged in social service, education, and public welfare.
Education
Dr. Dilip Kumar Tiwari was born and raised in Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh, India. He completed his high school and intermediate education from institutions in Jaunpur. Showing a strong aptitude for technology and learning from an early age, he pursued a  Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)  from Varanasi, followed by a Masters of Computer Applications (MCA)  from Jaunpur.
To enhance his professional skills, Dr. Dilip Kumar Tiwari obtained a CCNA from NCR Corporation  Australia, gaining advanced knowledge in networking and computer systems. He later earned a Doctorate in Education, reflecting his dedication to academic excellence and his commitment to promoting quality education and social development.
Social Contributions
During the COVID-19 pandemic, Dr. Tiwari provided free oxygen, masks, food, and health facilities to underprivileged and affected families.
His foundation also began rehabilitation and educational programs for children who lost their parents to the pandemic.
At present, the foundation is working on constructing a school dedicated to such children.
Awards and Recognition
For his outstanding social work during the pandemic, Dr. Tiwari was selected for Presidential Honour by the Government of India.
His contributions have been highlighted by major newspapers such as Dainik Jagran and Amar Ujala.
The District Magistrate of Jaunpur also publicly praised his work through Twitter.
Organisation
Mission Zindagi Foundation — A social organisation committed to helping marginalised communities, orphaned children, and needy families.
---
Professional Career
Dr. Tiwari is a successful entrepreneur who operates an eco-friendly non-woven bag manufacturing industry that provides employment to many people.
References
1. “Dilip to be honoured by the President” – News article (Jaunpur).
2. Dainik Jagran and Amar Ujala – Articles on his COVID-19 relief work.
3. Official Twitter handle of District Magistrate Jaunpur – Public appreciation of his efforts.
